dt-option.name: searchPanes.emptyMessage

type.description: By setting the `-init searchPanes.emptyMessage` option to a string, any cells found in the table will be represented in the pane by that string.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init searchPanes.emptyMessage` parameter is `\<i\>No Data\</i\>`.
dt-option.description: Empty cells will be represented in the panes by the option `-init searchPanes.emptyMessage`. This is useful as it's a more user-friendly way than just having a blank cell.

example.title: Altering Empty Message for each column
